title: CHINA AND THE TRUMP ADMINISTRATION | Escaping the Cave | Ft. Haz Al-Din
description:
This episode features and interview with Haz Al-Din, the philosopher and political theorist of the Infrared Collective who developed the concept of "MAGA Communism." He is also the Executive Chairman of the American Communist Party. 

Escaping the Cave with Carlos Garrido is a Geopolitics and Philosophy show. Carlos L. Garrido is a philosophy professor, Director at the Midwestern Marx Institute, and Secretary of Education for the American Communist Party. 

TIMECODES: 

0:00 - Intro 
0:05 - China and the Meaning of DEEPSEEK
18:06 - How to Help?
19:20 - Haz Al-Din - Trump and MAGA
22:04 - Haz - MAGA Communism
26:42 - Haz and the American Communist Party
29:20 - Conclusion
